nodes.text: Perekta Mesa was a mesa on the planet Makeb that was severely damaged during the numerous groundquakes that occurred during the Conquest of Makeb. The settlement atop the mesa was destroyed when the mesa cracked open in several places, leaving gaping canyons in the mesa's peak.
The Perekta Mesa appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a 2013 Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
